transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haan.
Customer: Sir Vijay bol raha hu.
Executive: Boliye Vijay ji.
Customer: Haan, sir kab tak connect karenge aap video is par?
Executive: Main abhi road pe hu ja kar ke kar de raha hu thodi der baad phone karta hu aapko theek hai, aap phone karna mujhe kyunki usi phone mein show kar paunga aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to know when the executive will connect on video.



Resolution:

- Executive stated they are on the road and will call back later to connect via video.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will call the customer back later. Customer can also call the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

video call, connection
